name: yoga-layout
description: Yoga is a cross-platform layout engine enabling maximum collaboration within your team by implementing an API many designers are familiar with, and opening it up to developers across different platforms.

scripts.build:node: npm -- run copy-sources && npm -- run node-gyp configure build
scripts.build:browser: npm -- run copy-sources && npm -- run node-gyp configure build --asmjs=1
scripts.build:all: npm -- run build:node && npm -- run build:browser && npm -- run build:standalone
scripts.test:all: npm -- run test:node && npm -- run test:browser
scripts.install: npm -- run autogypi && npm -- run build:node
